rows.label: qev015891_MSG0001
rows.name:
I wonder why there isn't a bookstore here in the
commercial district. You know? Some place where I
could pick up old books from Earth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0002
rows.name:
I know a lot of that data was lost when the White
Whale crashed, and that what remains has yet to be
organized in any kind of meaningful way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0003
rows.name:
But for the sake of New LA's current residents as well
as future generations, we have a duty to make such
texts available to any who want them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0004
rows.name:
Plus then I could finally get my hands on that book I've
been looking for about the French Revolution! Anyway,
yeah... I really hope they open a store like that soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, for now I guess I'll just search the provisional
government's public database.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0006
rows.name:
There's got to be someone around here who would
know how to find the data I'm looking for, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0007
rows.name:
Pulling anything out of all that raw data is such a
damn hassle. It'd help if I knew where to start looking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_JNK0010
rows.name: Help[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that a Prone named Sajif Scoppio could help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_JNK0020
rows.name: Prod[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_SEL0021
rows.name: Urge Beats to find the data himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0008
rows.name:
What, seriously? The Prone read books?
...I figured they'd just eat 'em or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0009
rows.name:
And you're saying that this Prone is actually interested
in Napoleon? That is so...unexpected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0010
rows.name:
You know, the title of my undergraduate thesis was
"The Crimes and Punishment of Napoleon."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0011
rows.name:
I hold some pretty critical opinions about the guy,
so I'm not sure if your Prone buddy and I would see
eye to eye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I'd sure like to talk to him and find out!
Anyway, thanks for the tip. I really appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0013
rows.name:
Yeah, I guess it's always when you're searching for
some specific book that you end up chancing upon
new discoveries and bits of knowledge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0014
rows.name: So maybe I shouldn't resist doing the searching myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0015
rows.name:
All right, you've convinced me. I'll just have to think
back to the days I spent wandering my college library
in search of reference material.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0016
rows.name:
And I suppose while I'm at it, I can put in an official
request for someone to start organizing the data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015891_MSG0017
rows.name:
That way, future generations will more easily be able to
learn about humanity's history.[ST:wait ]
